rules_text:
Trample
Boast – {1}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. [i](Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]It might not seem to be the worst enemy one could make, but it is resilient, it is long-lived, and it knows how to hold a grudge.[/i]
